disable_promo: To disable the promo link, you need to pay for the functionality of the "Designer" module. You can do this on the main page, in the Tariffs - custom payment configurator block.
widget_offer_to_pay: To install/update a widget, you need to pay for the functionality of the "Widget" module. You can do this on the main page, in the Tariffs - custom payment configurator block.
chatbot_offer_to_pay: To install/update a chatbot, you need to pay for the functionality of the "Chatbot" module. You can do this on the main page, in the Tariffs - custom payment configurator block.
cover_offer_to_pay: To install/update a cover, you need to pay for the functionality of the "Cover" module. You can do this on the main page, in the Tariffs - custom payment configurator block.
procedure_error: Payment procedure error. Reload the page and try again.
thank_you: Thank you so much for your purchase.
internal: Payment in the widget without leaving the app.
external: Payment in the YooKassa payment system.
